content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
A death-defying thrill-ride starring Joe Danger: Master of Disaster! Combo, boost and pull ludicrous stunts to fill stadiums and put Joe back on the podium. Take on your rivals, the reckless Team Nasty, then take on the World with your high-scoring Combos. Leap school buses full of screaming kids, pools of ravenous sharks and enormous boxing gloves, as you attempt to wheelie your way into the record books. Drop into the sandbox to make your own events and set new records. Laugh in the face of danger! As you crash and bounce from boulder to boulder, on fire, towards a pile of giant mousetraps. Wear the cape of the World’s Most Determined Stuntman, but can you take Joe from zero to hero as you ride through over 80 eye-poppingly gorgeous levels?

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
Network Features
16384KB Minimum
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
